text: Hagi amanahu'za avanagnazama kofina ke'noe, hosi afutamimofo agumpima mani'ne'za eri'za nevaza vahe'mo'za zamimizare'ma rufite'naza hankozmimofo avoma'amo'a, koranke nehigeno, hokonke nehigeno, kaninkruke nehigeno, tevene salfa havemo toki nehigeno, ana hosi afutamimofo zamagenopamo'a laioni agenopagna nehigeno, zamagipintira tevene, salfa havemo'a toki hiankna huno atiramino evu'ne.
